name: Skysa RSS Reader App
author: Skysa

sections.description:
The Skysa RSS Reader is a simple RSS reader for your site. You can choose how many RSS feed items to display and how much text to show in the preview. You also have the option of linking to the RSS feed source articles or allowing the preview to be expanded right on your site.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zj1uGXX2xrk&hd=1
More Skysa App plugins -|||- Skysa App Bar Integration plugin
sections.installation:
1. Install the Skysa RSS Reader App either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server (in the /wp-content/plugins/ directory).
  2. Activate the plugin.

You can now manage your RSS Reader app settings from Skysa Bar Apps > RSS Reader on your WordPress admin menu.

Optional

For added style customization and display options, you can install the Skysa App Bar Integration plugin and connect it to a Skysa account.
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • Insured support for WordPress 4.0

1.3

  • Fixed bug that caused the app not to load if specific characters were used in the settings.

1.21

  • Support for WordPress 3.5.1 Added.

1.2

  • Fixed compatibility issue with WordPress version 3.5.

1.15

  • Fixed an issue with MySQL database configurations set to require UTF8

1.1

  • Fixed a potential issue with app settings not saving in some configurations.

1.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: Display interactive summaries from an RSS (or Atom) feed in a dynamic ajax window on your site; customizable RSS feed app button.

screenshots.caption: RSS Reader app open with an item expanded, showing the full RSS feed item content.
Some of the preset styles available when the the Skysa App Bar Integration plugin is also active on a website. All preset styles can be fully customized.
